messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

issue when raising new sent tuesday re notification fusion purchase requests dear experienced similar issue when raising category stationary branded backpack cannot proceed order can you please give advice how solve issue thanks specialist sent tuesday notification fusion purchase requests importance high dear we currently rolling out fusion categories improvement exercise you encounter error when trying raise purchase requests we get back you we have any updates also list categories follow shortly should you have any questions or encounter any errors please hesitate contact thank you best regards ext hub
